message: Identified JSON structure requirements: Each week has topics array with id, title, subtitle, summary, keyTakeaways, content array (heading/paragraph/list/callout types), and questions array with 15+ MCQs (question, options array, answer).

Week 3 Learning Outcomes: (1) Learning definition, (2) Classical conditioning (Pavlov), (3) Operant conditioning (Thorndike/Skinner), (4) Preparedness (Seligman), (5) Cognitive approaches (Tolman's latent learning, Kohler's insight), (6) Learned helplessness. Key studies: Little Albert/Peter, puzzle box, Skinner box, preparedness experiments.

Week 4 Motivation Outcomes: (1) Motivation definitions (Geen, Miller, Rubin/McNeil), (2) Drive theory (Hull - homeostasis), (3) Instinct theory, (4) Arousal theory (optimal arousal), (5) Expectancy-value theory (Motivation = Expectancy × Value), (6) Intrinsic vs Extrinsic motivation, (7) Achievement motivation (McClelland/Atkinson - TAT).

Comprehensive analysis completed for Weeks 3-4. Created two deliverables: (1) weeks_3-4_content_analysis.md - 18 key concepts with detailed definitions, studies, examples, and 33 quiz topics; (2) weeks_3-4_structured_data.json - structured data ready for JSON generation matching existing format. Total: 11 Week 3 concepts, 7 Week 4 concepts, 16 unique theorists, 17 studies referenced.

QUALITY VERIFICATION COMPLETE: All deliverables created successfully. (1) weeks_3-4_content_analysis.md - 339 lines, comprehensive analysis with all key concepts, studies, examples, comparison tables; (2) weeks_3-4_structured_data.json - 14KB structured data matching existing JSON format; (3) WEEK_3-4_SUMMARY.md - Quick reference for JSON generators with implementation guidelines. Ready for Phase 2 implementation.
